description:
This course is designed for anyone wanting to improve an ACT math score or score well on their first time.  The course includes:

  • Over 3 hours of instructional videos 
  • Over 150 ACT-type math questions
  • Steps to solve each problem
  • Answers for each question

The course is broken into 6 sections based on the subjects covered on past ACT exams.  Each lecture is broken into 1-4 minute videos where example problems are worked.  You are encouraged to work the questions on your own and watch the videos to see step-by-step solutions to check your answers.  

You will gain confidence in working math problems for the ACT exam if you practice with the problems while watching this course.  Get started and Learn ACT Math today!
title: Learn ACT Math
